articles.author: Charlie Weston
articles.title: ECB rate rise leaves tracker holders facing €2400 increase in yearly repayments - Independent.ie
articles.description: The European Central Bank (ECB) is set to impose another rate rise next week – in a move that will hit tracker mortgage holders and make borrowing for first-time buyers more expensive.
articles.content:
The European Central Bank (ECB) is set to impose another rate rise next week in a move that will hit tracker mortgage holders and make borrowing for first-time buyers more expensive.
